title: Binance assists Royal Thai Police in massive crypto scam crackdown, leading to recovery of over $270M
description:
Binance, the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem and digital asset infrastructure provider, recently assisted the Royal Thai Police in two primary operations to dismantle criminal networks engaged in crypto scams. According to a Binance blog post, these significant enforcement actions, marked by the arrest of principal members and substantial asset seizures, underline Binance’s commitment to buttressing […]

The post Binance assists Royal Thai Police in massive crypto scam crackdown, leading to recovery of over $270M appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage Release Date, Pre-Load Details, and Editions Revealed
description: Assassin’s Creed fans, the long wait is nearly over. Ubisoft’s upcoming installment in the iconic franchise, Assassin’s Creed: Mirage, is set to launch globally on Thursday, October 5. In an exciting move, Ubisoft decided to move up the release date by one week, originally slated for October 12. This highly anticipated game promises a return ... Read more

title: Binance Faces Class-Action Lawsuit: Accused of FTX’s Downfall
description: Binance and its CEO, Changpeng Zhao, face a class-action lawsuit, accused of using strategic moves to negatively impact competitor FTX and its financial standing. The lawsuit suggests that Zhao used social media, particularly Twitter, to disseminate information and impact FTX’s utility token FTT’s market value. On October 2nd, a class-action lawsuit presented a new arena [...]

title: 4 Signs That Crypto Adoption Is in Good Shape
description:
In the recent past, many black swan events have occurred in crypto. Some examples include the collapse of Terra Luna and FTX’s bankruptcy. What followed was a prolonged bear market period. But, every cloud has a silver lining. Fast forward to October 2023, we could be seeing signs of a crypto market revival.  Today, we’ll […]

The post 4 Signs That Crypto Adoption Is in Good Shape appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Crypto Insider Blows Hot in Explosive Allegations Against SEC
description:
Crypto Insider and former Ethereum advisor Steven Nerayoff said the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission had a target list of people within crypto, including tech journalist Naomi Brockwell. According to Nerayoff, the SEC wanted his help in taking them out. In a post that has gathered attention on X, Nerayoff accused the regulatory agency of […]

The post Crypto Insider Blows Hot in Explosive Allegations Against SEC appeared first on Coin Edition.
